verses.verse: Jude,<WG2455> the servant<WG1401> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547> and brother<WG80> of James,<WG2385> to them that are sanctified<WG37> by God<WG2316> the Father,<WG3962> and preserved<WG5083> in Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547> and called:<WG2822>
Mercy<WG1656> to you, and peace,<WG1515> and love,<WG26> be multiplied.<WG4129>

Beloved,<WG27> when I gave<WG4160> all<WG3956> diligence<WG4710> to write<WG1125> to you of the common<WG2839> salvation,<WG4991> it was needful<WG318> for me to write<WG1125> to you, and exhort<WG3870> you that you should earnestly<WG1864> contend<WG1864> for the faith<WG4102> which was once<WG530> delivered<WG3860> to the saints.<WG40>

For there are certain<WG5100> men<WG444> crept<WG3921> in unawares,<WG3921> who<WG3588> were before<WG4270> of old<WG3819> ordained<WG4270> to this<WG5124> condemnation,<WG2917> ungodly<WG765> men, turning<WG3346> the grace<WG5485> of our God<WG2316> into<WG1519> lasciviousness,<WG766> and denying<WG720> the only<WG3441> Lord<WG1203> God,<WG2316> and our Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ.<WG5547>

I will<WG1014> therefore put<WG5279> you in remembrance,<WG5179> though you once<WG530> knew<WG1492> this,<WG5124> how that the Lord,<WG2962> having saved<WG4982> the people<WG2992> out of the land<WG1093> of Egypt,<WG125> afterward<WG1208> destroyed<WG622> them that believed<WG4100> not.

And the angels<WG32> which kept<WG5083> not their first<WG746> estate, but left<WG620> their own<WG2398> habitation,<WG3613> he has reserved<WG5083> in everlasting<WG126> chains<WG1199> under<WG5259> darkness<WG2217> to the judgment<WG2920> of the great<WG3173> day.<WG2250>

Even<WG5613> as Sodom<WG4670> and Gomorrha,<WG1116> and the cities<WG4172> about<WG4012> them in like<WG3664> manner,<WG5158> giving<WG3923> themselves over<WG1608> to fornication,<WG1608> and going<WG565> after<WG3694> strange<WG2087> flesh,<WG4561> are set<WG4295> forth<WG4295> for an example,<WG1164> suffering<WG5254> the vengeance<WG1349> of eternal<WG166> fire.<WG4442>
Likewise<WG3668> also<WG2532> these<WG3778> filthy dreamers<WG1797> defile<WG3392> the flesh,<WG4561> despise<WG114> dominion,<WG2963> and speak<WG987> evil<WG987> of dignities.<WG1391>

Yet<WG1161> Michael<WG3413> the archangel,<WG743> when<WG3753> contending<WG1252> with the devil<WG1228> he disputed<WG1256> about<WG4012> the body<WG4983> of Moses,<WG3475> dared<WG5111> not bring<WG2018> against<WG2018> him a railing<WG988> accusation,<WG2920> but said,<WG2036> The Lord<WG2962> rebuke<WG2008> you.

But these<WG3778> speak<WG987> evil<WG987> of those<WG3745> things which<WG3745> they know<WG1492> not: but what<WG3745> they know<WG1987> naturally,<WG5447> as brute<WG249> beasts,<WG2226> in those<WG5125> things they corrupt<WG5351> themselves.

Woe<WG3759> to them! for they have gone<WG4198> in the way<WG3598> of Cain,<WG2535> and ran<WG1632> greedily<WG1632> after the error<WG4106> of Balaam<WG903> for reward,<WG3408> and perished<WG622> in the gainsaying<WG485> of Core.<WG2879>

These<WG3778> are spots<WG4694> in your<WG5216> feasts of charity,<WG26> when they feast<WG4910> with you, feeding<WG4165> themselves<WG1438> without<WG870> fear:<WG870> clouds<WG3507> they are without<WG504> water,<WG504> carried<WG4064> about<WG4064> of winds;<WG417> trees<WG1186> whose fruit<WG5352> wither,<WG5352> without<WG175> fruit,<WG175> twice<WG1364> dead,<WG599> plucked<WG1610> up by the roots;<WG1610>

Raging<WG66> waves<WG2949> of the sea,<WG2281> foaming<WG1890> out their own<WG1438> shame;<WG152> wandering<WG4107> stars,<WG792> to whom<WG3739> is reserved<WG5083> the blackness<WG2217> of darkness<WG4655> for ever.<WG165>

And Enoch<WG1802> also,<WG2532> the seventh<WG1442> from Adam,<WG76> prophesied<WG4395> of these,<WG5125> saying,<WG3004> Behold,<WG2400> the Lord<WG2962> comes<WG2064> with ten<WG3461> thousands<WG3461> of his saints,<WG40>

To execute<WG4160> judgment<WG2920> on all,<WG3956> and to convince<WG1827> all<WG3956> that are ungodly<WG763> among them of all<WG3956> their ungodly<WG763> deeds<WG2041> which<WG3739> they have ungodly<WG764> committed,<WG764> and of all<WG3956> their hard<WG4642> speeches which<WG3739> ungodly<WG765> sinners<WG268> have spoken<WG2980> against<WG2596> him.

These<WG3778> are murmurers,<WG1113> complainers,<WG3202> walking<WG4198> after<WG2596> their own<WG848> lusts;<WG1939> and their mouth<WG4750> speaks<WG2980> great<WG5246> swelling<WG5246> words, having men's<WG4383> persons<WG4383> in admiration<WG2296> because<WG5484> of advantage.<WG5622>
But, beloved,<WG27> remember<WG3415> you the words<WG4487> which<WG3588> were spoken<WG4280> before<WG4280> of the apostles<WG652> of our Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ;<WG5547>
How that they told<WG3004> you there should be mockers<WG1703> in the last<WG2078> time,<WG5550> who should walk<WG4198> after<WG2596> their own<WG1438> ungodly<WG763> lusts.<WG1939>
These<WG3778> be they who separate<WG592> themselves,<WG1438> sensual,<WG5591> having<WG2192> not the Spirit.<WG4151>
But you, beloved,<WG27> building<WG2026> up yourselves<WG1438> on your<WG5216> most<WG40> holy<WG40> faith,<WG4102> praying<WG4336> in the Holy<WG40> Ghost,<WG4151>
Keep<WG5083> yourselves<WG1438> in the love<WG26> of God,<WG2316> looking<WG4327> for the mercy<WG1656> of our Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> to eternal<WG166> life.<WG2222>
And of some<WG3588> <WG3303> have compassion,<WG1653> making<WG1252> a difference:<WG1252>
And others<WG3739> save<WG4982> with fear,<WG5401> pulling<WG726> them out of the fire;<WG4442> hating<WG3404> even<WG2532> the garment<WG5509> spotted<WG4695> by the flesh.<WG4561>

Now<WG1161> to him that is able<WG1410> to keep<WG5442> you from falling,<WG679> and to present<WG2476> you faultless<WG299> before<WG2714> the presence<WG2714> of his glory<WG1391> with exceeding joy,<WG20>

To the only<WG3441> wise<WG4680> God<WG2316> our Savior,<WG4990> be glory<WG1391> and majesty,<WG3172> dominion<WG2904> and power,<WG1849> both<WG2532> now<WG3568> and ever.<WG3956> <WG165> Amen.<WG281>
